ruleset.name: pmd-ui-dogfood
ruleset.description: Rules specific to the UI module.

rule.name: InternalApiUsage
rule.message: This module should not use pmd-core''s internal API
rule.description: Injected FXML fields should be suffixed by their type

rule.name: FxmlApiVersion
rule.message: FXML docs for this project should specify an API version of 8: xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/8"
rule.description: FXML docs for this project should specify an API version of 8.

rule.name: FxIdNamingConvention
rule.message: Injected FXML fields should be suffixed by their type, eg 'HelloButton'
rule.description: Injected FXML fields should be suffixed by their type

property.name: xpath
property.value:
//ClassOrInterfaceBodyDeclaration[Annotation[pmd-java:typeIs('javafx.fxml.FXML')]] /FieldDeclaration/VariableDeclarator/VariableDeclaratorId [not(ends-with(@Image, ../../Type/@TypeImage))]
(: The following are the exceptions to the rule :) [not(ends-with(@Image, 'Controller') and ends-with(../../Type/@TypeImage, 'Controller'))] [not(../../Type/@TypeImage = 'TextField' and ends-with(@Image, 'Field'))] [not(../../Type/@TypeImage = 'ToggleButton' and ends-with(@Image, 'Toggle'))] [not(../../Type/@TypeImage = 'TextArea' or ends-with(../../Type/@TypeImage, 'CodeArea') and ends-with(@Image, 'Area'))] [not(../../Type/@TypeImage = 'TableColumn' and ends-with(@Image, 'Column'))] [not(ends-with(../../Type/@TypeImage, 'TitledPane') and ends-with(@Image, 'Pane'))] (: This last clause allows variables to be named the same as their type, modulo Camel case :) (: Ideally we would only allow this for our custom types, but there's currently no easy :) (: way to get the type name of a node to check the package. :) (: We should create a function for that, eg typeNameOf :) [not(string-length(../../Type/@TypeImage) = string-length(@Image) and substring(../../Type/@TypeImage, 2) = substring(@Image, 2))]
